## Arithmetic progression

$$a_n = a_1+(n-1)d$$
$$S_n = \frac{n(a_1+a_n)}{2} $$

## Geometric progression

$$a_n = a_1(r)^d$$
$$S_n = \frac{a_1(1-r^n)}{1-r} $$

$$\text{if } |r|<1 \text{ then } S_\infty = \frac{a}{1-r} $$
